definition: to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: Tibetan Buddhism Tangka art has a long history and superb techniques.
sentences.chinese: 藏传佛教的唐卡艺术历史悠久，技艺精湛。

sentences.english: Thangka handed down mostly works of Tibetan Buddhism and Bon.
sentences.chinese: 传世唐卡大都是藏传佛教和苯教作品。

sentences.english: Tibetan Buddhism also holds the notion that Precious Umbrella symbolizes the power of Buddha's edification.
sentences.chinese: 藏传佛教亦认为，宝伞象征着佛陀教诲的权威。

sentences.english: In the various sects of Tibetan Buddhism, the Gelug Sect is the latest to form one.
sentences.chinese: 在藏传佛教的各个教派中，格鲁派是最晚形成的一个。

sentences.english: Today, the most popular religion in Mongolia is Lamaism.
sentences.chinese: 当今的蒙古，藏传佛教是最为流行的宗教。

sentences.english: According to Tibetan Buddhism, treasure bottle could keep down demons, protect from disasters and bring the safety.
sentences.chinese: 藏传佛教认为宝瓶可以镇邪消灾保一方平安。

sentences.english: Until then, the mantle of leadership could well rest with the Karmapa.
sentences.chinese: 那时，藏传佛教的领导者只能依靠大宝法王。

sentences.english: The thangka, or scroll painting, is a special art of Tibetan Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 唐卡，又称卷轴画，是藏传佛教的一种特殊艺术。

sentences.english: After generations, Tibetan Buddhism has accumulated substantial property.
sentences.chinese: 历经传承，藏传佛教积累了丰厚的财产。

sentences.english: In the early 17th century the Oirat Mongols accepted Tibetan Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 17世纪初，卫拉特蒙古人接受了藏传佛教。

sentences.english: The Karmapa is leader of a Tibetan Buddhist tradition known as the Karma Kagyu.
sentences.chinese: 喀玛巴是藏传佛教噶玛噶举派的领袖。

sentences.english: The Living Buddha reincarnation system, unique to Tibetan Buddhism, is fully respected.
sentences.chinese: 藏传佛教特有的活佛转世的传承方式得到充分尊重。

sentences.english: The silver box is most likely to be a holy item of the Karmah Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 这件玲珑精致的银盒应是藏传佛教噶举派的圣物。

sentences.english: Tangka is the distinguished painting art of Tibetan Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 唐卡是藏传佛教中的独有宗教绘画艺术。

sentences.english: Tibetan Buddhism was praised highly during the period of Emperor Chengzu in Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 明代自成祖开始崇好藏传佛教，宦官也因之深受影响。

sentences.english: Tibetan Buddhism that emerged was widely worshipped by the Tubo residents.
sentences.chinese: 藏传佛教的出现受到广泛崇拜的吐蕃居民。

definition: Geju (Tibetan: transmit word of Buddha) sect of Tibetan Buddhist
Ganden monastery, Tibetan: dGa' ldan rNam rgyal gling, Dagzê county 達孜縣|达孜县[Da2 zi1 xian4], Lhasa, Tibet
Tsongkhapa (1357-1419), Tibetan religious leader, founder of the Gelugpa school 格魯派|格鲁派[Ge2 lu3 pai4]
Yellow hat or Gelugpa school of Tibetan Buddhism/also written 格魯派|格鲁派[Ge2 lu3 pai4]
Jokhang, main Buddhist temple in Lhasa, a sacred place of Tibetan Buddhism
former Tibetan province of Kham, now split between Tibet and Sichuan
Living Buddha/title of Mongolian Lamas from 17th century
